description: Creates a version of the SageMaker AI image specified by ImageName. The version represents the Amazon ECR container image specified by BaseImage.

parameters.name: BaseImage
parameters.description: The registry path of the container image to use as the starting point for this version. The path is an Amazon ECR URI in the following format: <acct-id>.dkr.ecr.<region>.amazonaws.com/<repo-name[:tag] or [@digest]>

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A unique ID. If not specified, the Amazon Web Services CLI and Amazon Web Services SDKs, such as the SDK for Python (Boto3), add a unique value to the call. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: ImageName
parameters.description: The ImageName of the Image to create a version of.

parameters.name: Aliases
parameters.description: A list of aliases created with the image version. (string) ---

parameters.name: VendorGuidance
parameters.description: The stability of the image version, specified by the maintainer. NOT_PROVIDED: The maintainers did not provide a status for image version stability. STABLE: The image version is stable. TO_BE_ARCHIVED: The image version is set to be archived. Custom image versions that are set to be archived are automatically archived after three months. ARCHIVED: The image version is archived. Archived image versions are not searchable and are no longer actively supported.

parameters.name: JobType
parameters.description: Indicates SageMaker AI job type compatibility. TRAINING: The image version is compatible with SageMaker AI training jobs. INFERENCE: The image version is compatible with SageMaker AI inference jobs. NOTEBOOK_KERNEL: The image version is compatible with SageMaker AI notebook kernels.

parameters.name: Processor
parameters.description: Indicates CPU or GPU compatibility. CPU: The image version is compatible with CPU. GPU: The image version is compatible with GPU.

nested_items.name: ImageVersionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the image version.
